3R2k1/pp2qppp/2p2n2/4b3/2P5/2N1P3/PB2QPPP/6K1 b - - 0 18

{"Explanation":"The move e7d8 (moving the black queen from e7 to d8) is the best move as it averts the imminent threat of a back-rank checkmate from the white rook on d8, which would end the game immediately. By placing the queen on d8, Black adds an extra defender to the now vulnerable d8 square. Moreover, the queen on d8 covers multiple escape squares for the back-rank and maintains control over strategic central squares, offering Black flexibility to mount a defense or counterattack. This move is essential for maintaining a reasonable defensive structure and prolonging the game.","BestMove":"bestmove e7d8"}
